synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: Zn(NO3)2 ⋅ 4 H2O (2.89 mmol), H2(CX-bdc) linker precursor (0.666 mmol), DMF (50 ml)
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: dynamic vacuum (10-3 mbar) at 100 °C for 20 h
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Crystals were stored in a Schlenk tube under argon atmosphere.

synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: Zn(NO3)2 ⋅ 4 H2O (0.44 mmol), 3,3’-dioctyloxy-(1,1’-biphenyl)-4,4’-dicarboxylic acid (0.08 mmol), DEF (12 ml)
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: benzene exchange (3 × 15 ml), freeze drying, dynamic vacuum at 80 °C for 15 h, then 110 °C for 6 h
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Samples were stored in a Schlenk flask under Argon atmosphere.

synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: Zn(NO3)2 ⋅ 4 H2O (0.34 mmol), 1,3,5-tris(3’-octyloxy-4’-carboxyphenyl)benzene (0.05 mmol), DMF/NMP/EtOH (3.75/3.75/0.75 ml)
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: benzene exchange (3 × 10 ml), freeze drying, dynamic vacuum at 80 °C for 15 h, then 110 °C for 6 h
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Samples were stored in a Schlenk flask under Argon atmosphere.

synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: Zn(NO3)2⋅6H2O (6.1 mmol), 1,4-benzenedicarboxylic acid (2.0 mmol), DEF (50 ml)
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: DMF (3 × 50 ml, dried over 4 Å molecular sieve), DCM (3 × 50 ml)
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: dynamic vacuum (10-2 mbar) at 100 °C for 20 h
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Samples were stored in a Schlenk tube under argon atmosphere.
